name: Jade
description:
Crystal; Jade
Material; Organic Hemp / Gold plated 
Closure type; clasp 
Color; black
Jade crystal secured with gold plated ringlets on organic black hemp. The chain is handmade  secured with the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.

Chakras - Heart Chakra
Zodiac - Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Libra
Element - Earth
Typical colours - Creamy white, pale green to emerald green, blue, lavender-mauve and pink.

Jade is a symbol of serenity and purity.  It signifies wisdom gathered in tranquility.  It increases love and nurturing.  A protective stone, Jade keeps the wearer from harm and brings harmony.  Jade attracts good luck and friendship.  It stabilises the personality and promotes self-sufficiency.  Soothes the mind, releasing negative thoughts.  Stimulates ideas.  A “dream stone”, Jade brings insightful dreams.  It aids emotional release, especially of irritability.  Jade encourages you to become who you really are.

Jade aids the body’s filtration and elimination organs.  It is excellent for treating kidney problems and adrenal glands.  Jade removes toxins, rebinds skeletal and cellular systems, and heals stitches.  It assists fertility and childbirth.  Jade balances body fluids.

name: Blue Calcite
description:
Crystal; Blue Calcite
Material; Organic Hemp / Gold Plated
Closure type; clasp 
Color;  beige
Blue Calcite crystal wrapped in beige organic hemp. Ringlets hang from the charm. The chain is handmade with gold plated ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.


 Calm Communication

Blue calcite is a stone that is especially calming and soothing. Nearness of blue calcite is great for calming frayed nerves. Blue calcite in your environment can make you aware of needs for rest, which is the first step in helping you get the rest you need.

Blue calcite is also an excellent stone for students. It helps retain lessons learned and amplifies learning.

Blue calcite also amplifies energy, particularly in the realms of communication and thought. Blue calcite is an excellent aid to communication. It fosters enlightened discussion, and eases communication between people with opposing views. It helps you express your views calmly and with tact. Blue calcite is also an enhancer of decision-making. It brings this quality to life through its ability to help you see more clearly what path will lead you to happiness. It also assists in remembering astral travel and channeling experiences. In the physical realm, blue calcite is used in crystal healing for the throat, lungs, tonsillitis, thyroid, arthrits, joints, and high blood pressure.

name: Rhodonite
description:
Crystal; Rhodonite
Material; Organic Hemp / deerskin lace
Closure type; wooden bead 
Color; White, beige
Rhodonite crystal wrapped in white deerskin lace hanging from beige organic hemp on a two tone white and beige hemp chain. Wooden bead used as the closure.

 Properties: Rhodonite is the "Stone of Love"! Rhodonite works with the Heart Chakra by soothing the heart center as well as the Root Chakra for grounding and balancing, due to the presence of black oxides in this stone. This balance of colors allows for a powerful and vibration for caring for one's self. Rhodonite allows for confidence and self worth. Helps us express confidence and lovingness on physical plane in day-to-day ways. Calms and feeds the soul through the heart; love and service. It helps us with confusion and allows us to focus. This stone helps to strengthen mantras, chanting, affirmations, singing and toning. There is an amazing correlations between photos from the universe and stones we have in the earth itself

Folk Remedies: Rhodonite has been used to facilitate stress, heartache, loss and reflection. The Ancients use it also for speech/hearing problems, growth, fear, illness (emphysema, asthma...) and for soothing nightmares. Use for trauma, confusion, and confidence. Very beneficial for the growth of bones.

Feng Shui: Rhodonite can be used to balance both Yin and Yang. Use Rhodonite in the Center area for emotional, spiritual balance, in the Southwest area for love, in the Northwest area for helpful people or in any other area where emotional healing is needed

name: Jasper
description:
Crystal; Jasper
Material; Organic Hemp / titanium Plated

Jasper crystal in a titanium plated crystal cage carrier that is interchangeable! The chain is handmade with titanium plated ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.

name: Tiger's Eye ( Hemp)
description:
Crystal; Tiger's Eye
Material; Organic Hemp / Gold Plated 
Closure type; clasp 
Color; yellow, sky blue, beige
Tiger's Eye crystal in a gold plated crystal cage carrier that is interchangeable! The chain is handmade with gold plated ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.


Hardness:  7

Tiger Eye has been around at least 5000 years. The chatoyance of this “male energy” stone makes it popular amongst gem appreciators.

Tiger Eye is a strong grounding, protective and energizing stone. It can ward off curses and negative wishes from others, clear our mental blocks, provide an overall calm and improve our self worth.

Tiger Eye overcomes discouragement and the “blues” and helps us accomplish our goals. Tiger Eye is extremely advantageous to those who are going through a difficult divorce or dispute because it allows those involved to see BOTH sides of the issue, consequently providing a peaceful solution.

Wear or carry Tiger Eye to combat asthma, migraine, fatigue, throat, digestion, eye issues and the healing of broken bones.

Many years ago, soldiers carried Tiger Eye to instill courage on the battlefield.

Interesting tidbits: The Japanese believed that Tiger Eye guaranteed a long life because supposedly the tiger lived for 1000 years. The Indians believed that Tiger Eye brought about wealth and prevented the loss of money. That might explain why tiger eye was frequently made into good luck charms and amulets.

name: Sodadite
description:
Crystal; Sodadite
Material; Organic Hemp / wooden beads
Closure type; wooden beads
Color;  beige, 
Sodadite crystal wrapped in beige organic hemp and chocolate deerskin lace. The chain is handmade with chocolate and oak wooden beads secured between the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.


Astrological Association:  Sagittarius
Chakra: Third eye  (6th)
Element:  Wind
Hardness:  5.5 – 6
Vibration:  4
Key Words:  truthfulness in emotions, intuititve abilitites, mental performance, enhanced insight
Sodalite is a sodium, aluminum chloride silicate. Originally discovered in Greenland in 1811, sodalite became more popular after being found in Ontario, Canada in 1891. Sodalite got its name from its high content of sodium.
Sodalite is most commonly royal blue with veins or patches of white calcite, however it can also be gray, green, pink or yellow. Sometimes folks have difficulty telling the difference between sodalite and lapis lazuli. The main distinction between sodalite and lapis is that lapis lazuli has gold flecks and sodalite does not. The gold coloring on the lapis is a result of pyrite growing with lapis.
Sodalite is one of the best stones for easing anger, overcoming adversity, clearing mental confusion and coming to logical conclusions. Sodalite promotes rational thinking, fellowship, purpose, companionship, self esteem, self trust, trust in others and an overall well being. This blue beauty inspires truth, idealism and objectivity and lets us release those old negative tapes that keep playing in our head.
Sodalite is a meditative stone that opens our spiritual awareness by combining our logic with our intuition. It enhances intuition and helps heal bruised emotions. Sodalite encourages restful sleep, spirituality, deep meditative thinking and direction. Good for calcium deficiency, digestion and glandular system.
This is a great stone for easing our fears, phobias and guilt and anything else which may hinder our healthy growth. Sodalite encourages good self esteem, self acceptance and self trust.
Sodalite also has some pretty significant physical properties. Sodalite has a cleansing effect on the lymphatic system, combats calcium deficiencies and regulates the metabolism . It is also beneficial for the vocal cords, larynx, hoarseness, throat, digestive issues, blood pressure and high fevers.

Many years ago, soldiers carried Tiger Eye to instill courage on the battlefield.

Interesting tidbits: The Japanese believed that Tiger Eye guaranteed a long life because supposedly the tiger lived for 1000 years. Zodiac - Leo, Virgo, Scorpio
Planet - Mars
Element - Fire
Typical colours - brown, red, orange, yellow, green

Jasper is known as the “supreme nurturer”.  It sustains and supports through times of stress, and brings tranquility and wholeness.  Jasper provides protection and absorbs negative energy.  It balances yin and yang.  Jasper clears electromagnetic and environmental pollution, including radiation.  It encourages honesty with one's self.  Provides courage to assertively tackle problems.  Aids quick-thinking and promotes organisational abilities.  Jasper stimulates the imagination and transforms ideas into action.  Prolongs sexual pleasure.  It supports during prolonged illness and re-energises the body.

name: Green Calcite
description:
Astrological Association:  Cancer
Hardness:  3  (Not a hard stone)


Calcite grows where water is present.  Calcite can be found in limestone and most seashells.  Shellfish (such as oysters) make their shells from Calcite.  Calcite itself is clear or white.  When it grows with other minerals in the Earth, calcite can become a multitude of colors.  Subjecting calcite to acid can enhance its color.
Calcite’s properties are associated with energy work and the energy within our body.  Calcite can increase, amplify  and distribute our energy and remove stagnant energy from our body. It can open and clear  our blockages.
Calcite is a great stone for learning as it aids our memory and acts as our personal professor for the arts and sciences. Calcite helps us move past our old patterns providing for all kinds of healing.  Calcite allows us to detach from the past, forgive others and start anew. It speeds up our spiritual development.  Calcite can remove hindrances and speed up our spiritual development.
Calcite benefits us physically by overcoming kidney, pancreas and spleen dis-eases.  Being a calcium based stone, calcite assimilates the calcium in our body and is also good for bone dis-orders.
Calcite eases our emotions and provides us with mental growth and clarification.  It assists us in changing our negative thinking by seeking out, absorbing and clearing out negative and undesirable energies and turning them positive. Calcite also clears and activates our chakras and removes blockages. 



Green Calcite can provide “balance” and help in stagnant situations.  This gorgeous translucent stone is great for getting rid of rigid beliefs and “old tapes” that keep playing in our head.  Call on Green Calcite to sharpen our communication skills and provide comfort to our mind.  Green Calcite is ideal for eliminating all the dis-eases and ailments associated with negative and angry behavior.

name: Lapiz Lazuli (color)
description:
Crystal; Lapiz Lazuli
Material; Organic Hemp / Titanium Plated 
Closure type; screw clasp 
Color; powder blue, beige
Lapiz Lazuli crystal in a Titanium plated crystal cage carrier that is interchangeable! The chain is handmade with titanium plated ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.

Astrological Connection: Sagittarius

Chakras: Third eye (6th) and Throat (5th)

Element: Wind

Hardness: 5 – 6

Vibration: 3

 

Key Words:  Truthful communication, Expanding Awareness, Emotional, Physical, Mental Purity and Clarity, Intuition, Virtuos-ness. Many ornaments and jewelry, especially for the Egyptian kings, were made with lapis. Ancient Greeks, Romans, Egyptians and Chinese used Lapis for making medicine, eye shadow, jewelry, art and walls.

Lapis helps us eliminate internalized emotional baggage that often makes us ill.  Like most blue stones, lapis is associated with the throat chakra (communication) and the third eye chakra (intuition).

Lapis is one of the stones for Sagittarians, giving them the power of friendship and helping them make decisions. Lapis lazuli promotes clear communication, discretion and gently helps Sagittarians keep their boca in check.

Lapis Lazuli eases migraines and headaches and increases courage and self confidence.

Physically, lapis helps us understand the karmic roots of our dis-eases and erase those related patterns and emotions that prevent our healing.

name: Amethyst
description:
Astrological Association: Aquarius, Capricorn, Pisces, Virgo 
Chakra(s): Third Eye (6th) and Crown (7th)
Element: Wind
Hardness: 7
Vibration: 3
Key words:  stone of contentment and royalty, natural tranquilizing effect

Stone personality: strong healing and cleansing powers, eliminates addictions (smoking, drinking, drugs)   
Physical Benefits:  strengthens skeletal system, improves posture, stimulates sympathetic nerves and endocrine glands, nervous system issues, digestion, heart, stomach, skin, teeth, hearing issues 
Eases:  migraines, insomnia, arthritis (as an elixir)
Emotional Benefits: eases sadness from loss, combats addictive behavior, inner peace, stabilizes mental issues, place under pillow for calming and stress relief,  understanding root of our behaviors and habits which cause imbalances and dis-ease, benefits those who feel like they are alien to Earth  
Mental Benefits: improves concentration, common sense, flexible decisions
Spiritual Benefits: transforms negative energy into positive energy, provides protection when carried or worn

name: Unakite
description:
Crystal; Unakite
Material; Organic Hemp / Titanium Filled 
Closure type;screw clasp 
Color; magenta, forest green, black
Unakite crystal in a titanium filled crystal cage carrier that is interchangeable! The chain is handmade with titanium filled ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.

Hardness: 6 – 7
Chakras: 3rd Eye (6th)
Especially beneficial for: Scorpios
Vibrates to the number 9

Unakite is a jasper composed  primarily up pink feldspar, green epidote and quartz.  Its mottled appearance may not be the prettiest face out there (some would disagree), however anyone who needs some serious healing of old emotional wounds can’t pick a better stone.

Unakite is a considered a stone of “vision.”  It also provides grounding if needed, especially after meditations, astral journeying or any kind of intuitive work.

Placed on the 3rd eye, it provides us with powerful visions from the celestial realm.

Unakite balances our emotions, aligns them with the spiritual forces and gently brings our unconscious actions to our consciousness.

It is also great for re-birthing, a process that helps us deal with the events of our past which have caused blockages in our chakras and meridians. Re-birthing helps us get rid of whatever has been inhibiting our growth.

Unakite looks beyond our physical symptoms and digs deep to find the underlying reasons that are causing our dis-ease(s). This extensive search includes the 4 main aspects of our being:  physical, emotional, intellectual and spiritual.

Its ability to go beneath the surface of our existence makes it a useful stone for scrying as it shows us where compromise and blending are needed.

Unakite is beneficial to the reproductive system and healthy pregnancies. It also promotes skin tissue and hair growth.  Now, here’s a real important strong point and something to keep in mind.  Unakite is a stone to have around when we are gaining our health and strength and recuperating from any major illness.

This is an ideal stone for your home. Put a nice sized piece or several tumbles of unakite in a dish and place on a table. It does more than spruce up your home with its unique color scheme.  Unakite gives off a gentle calm energy which can also protect us from the harmful effects of electromagnet pollution of TVs and computers.   In those cases, it is best if placed on top of or near the TV or computer.

name: Black Onyx
description:
Crystal; Black Onyx
Material; Organic Hemp
Closure; clasp
Color; Beige

Black Onyx wrapped in olive green and beige organic hemp covered with saddle deerskin lace. The chain is beige with brass ringlets on it. 

BLACK ONYX - Grounding Stone .

Attuned to Root Chakra - 1st and 5th chakr a's.

Astrological: Stone of Leo.

Vibrates to the Number #6 

Black Onyx enhances steadfastness and determination,  setting ones mind to a task. It is grounding stone, valuable in difficult or confusing times in our lives. Extremely helpful to people who are in the process of " letting go" or releasing the past attachments  to "people , places and things.

Excellent stone for initiating the process of centering and alignment of the total person with a Higher Power. It helps us to absorb whatever energy we need from the Universe.

Can be used to deflect or absorb the negativity of others, and in that way is a good stone for protection from negative forces and influences.  More powerful for people in recovery when combined with Amethyst - The Stone of Sobriety. 

Onyx helps you become the Master of your own Fate.

    Enhances self mastery
    Valuable in difficult or confusing times of our lives.
    Absorbs and flattens emotional intensity. Helps to smooth out the "Roller Coaster Ride" of emotions.
    Protection: A good stone for Entrepreneurs and Inventors, to repel negative energy surrounding other peoples opinions or ideas. 
    Detachment: The ancient Egyptians believe that it could cool the ardors of love and actually cause arguments  between lovers to the point of separation!  Use Onyx for self-protection or to keep away or end unhealthy or bothersome emotional entanglements.
    Letting Go: Extremely helpful to people who are having trouble letting go or releasing the past or attachments and moving on after a relationship has ended, sometimes years past the event. 
    Change: Helps release old beliefs and patterns that no longer serve us. 
    Visions, and guidance through meditation and dreams.

Excellent stone for initiating the process of centering and alignment of the total person with a Higher Power. It helps us to absorb whatever energy we need from the Universe.  Reduces Sexual desire. Balances and grounds.  Not a "healing stone", rather it repels (negative energy).

name: Clear Quartz
description:
Crystal; clear quartz
Material; Organic Hemp / Gold Filled
Closure type; clasp
Color; White, navy blue, beige

Clear quartz crystal in a gold filled crystal cage carrier that is interchangeable! The chain is handmade with gold filled ringlets secured into the knots. Necklace may stretch after normal wear.  
 
Chakras: All

Element: Storm

Hardness: 7

Vibration: 4

Key Words: Master Healer, Energizer, Amplifier, Cleanser, Magnifier and Programmer, Transformer, Transmitter of Energies, Improves Memory

Clear Quartz (aka Rock Crystal) is the “stone of power.”  Clear quartz is associated with electricity and energy, which makes this powerful crystal the master healer, programmer, transmitter, amplifier, energizer, transformer and cleanser.  The energy from Clear Quartz can be used to enhance the energy of other stones.

This transparent beauty automatically tunes into our needs without any conscious direction or programming from us.  Clear Quartz can increase our thoughts and give clarity to our thinking.

Clear Quartz is an extremely powerful and gentle healer for all  forms of illnesses, even when a diagnosis is not clear.  Clear Quartz harmonizes all of our chakras, brings our body into balance and provides emotional stability.  It provides a connection between our physical and mental energy.

Clear Quartz cleanses and enhances all of our organs. It benefits our circulation, stimulates our immune system, lessens vertigo, soothes burns and blisters and removes toxins from our body.

We can never have too much clear quartz in our surroundings. This clearly magnificent stone provides protection from harmful effects of radiation, radioactivity and electro magnetic pollution.

Clear Quartz provides us with a clear picture, which is why many crystal balls are made out of Clear Quartz.  The Gem Maven adores this crystal and believes that this “stone of power” can do practically anything.
